list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Adding first commit for question rest api endpoints. 1. Added code for endpoint /question/create 2. Added code for endpoint /question/all 3. Added code for endpoint /question/edit/{questionId} 4. Added code for endpoint /question/delete/{questionId} 5. Added code for endpoint /all/{userId 6. Added enum for Action to be performed and messaged updated in UserAuth based on different ActionType

task.summary: Added Entity classes for User_auth table, Question table and Answer table. Improved formatting for quora.sql file to make it more readable.
Added Entity classes for User_auth table, Question table and Answer table. Improved formatting for quora.sql file to make it more readable.
Added Entity classes for User_auth table, Question table and Answer table. Improved formatting for quora.sql file to make it more readable.
Updated Answer Entity with right property and methods.

Following changes are added: 1. Added new method for sign endpoint in UserController class 2. AuthenticationService class which authenticates the user with username and password. 3. RoleType enu indicating admin or non-admin user.
Following changes are added: 1. Added changes to add user authorization value in UserAuth table. 2. Added code to save the authcode in database. 3. Refactored code to add constants.
Following changes are added: 1. Implementation for endpoint of signout service is added. 3. Refactored code to add constants.
Following changes are added: 1. Updations done to signout service. 2. Refactored code to add constants. 3. Added new service endpoints for deletion, sign and signout.
Adding first commit for question rest api endpoints. This branch will have all the changes for question api
